name: jonfio-plugins
description: Claude Code plugin collection featuring DAW development tools, agentic orchestration frameworks, and Google ADK integration.

plugins.name: daw-workflow
plugins.description: Production-grade DAW development toolkit with DSP mathematics, real-time audio patterns, Elementary Audio integration, state management, and professional audio metering.

plugins.name: agentic-orchestration
plugins.description: Systematic orchestration framework for managing complex multi-task projects through agentic execution.

plugins.name: google-adk
plugins.description: Google Agent Development Kit (ADK) toolkit for building, evaluating, and deploying AI agents. Includes prompt engineering, tool design, multi-agent patterns, and deployment workflows.
